Title: Prove $A=B=\pi$

$\gamma=0.57721566...$ $\phi=\frac{1+\sqrt5}{2}$ Let, $$A=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\arctan\left(\frac{(e+e^{-1})(\phi^{\frac{2n-1}{2}}+\phi^{\frac{1-2n}{2}})}{e^2+e^{-2}-1+\phi^{2n-1}+\phi^{1-2n}}\right)$$

Can anyone prove (1)
